intro:
A new adventure drawn atop a small notebook!
A protagonist trapped in a page of scribbled obstacles.
Avoid the doodled obstructions to escape the notebook!
description:
One boring day in class, the mindless scribbles on one page of a notebook become the beginnings of an epic journey!

Our protagonist, drawn alone into one small page, decides to escape the notebook. However, the obstacles scribbled along his path make escape look like no easy task...

Join our protagonist's adventure through this scribbled chaos!

[ Gameplay ]

- A mighty challenge in one small notebook
In this page filled with scribbled doodles, there's only one objective: muster every ounce of strength to avoid obstacles and traps, test your patience, and keep moving upward!

- Various obstacles littering the map!
The obstacles continue as you climb ever upward. Drop, pull, push, throw, bump, and climb! Avoid the strategically placed traps to escape each stage.

- Careful with the landing
Even when you do take a break, don't let your guard down!
Find a sturdy shelter to avoid unfortunate slip-ups!

- Unique graphics fashioned as pencil sketches
Art feeling like it was hand-drawn on paper! Freely explore each stage uniquely designed around a specific concept!
